input_query:
You plan to visit 5 European cities for 26 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Dublin for 5 days. You want to spend 7 days in Vilnius. You want to spend 7 days in Split. You want to meet a friend in Split between day 7 and day 13. You want to spend 4 days in Porto. During day 17 and day 20, you have to attend a conference in Porto. You want to spend 7 days in Nice.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Dublin and Nice, Porto and Nice, Dublin and Porto, Vilnius and Split, Split and Dublin.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 26 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
